title: Developer’s Introduction to the Replicate AI Playground
author: David Eastman
description: Replicate lets developers explore AI models in a controllable fashion, while keeping you connected to the backend processes and code.
cntitle: 开发者 Replicate AI Playground 介绍
cndescription: Replicate 让开发者以可控的方式探索 AI 模型，同时让你与后端流程和代码保持连接。
